channel.title: Abouts on Eugene Dobrovolsky
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Eugene Dobrovolsky

item.title: Hey, my name is Eugene
item.description: History Its started out as a hobby when I got into print design and typography. I took a course in graphic design and learned the basics of color, composition, typography, and how to apply it in branding. Then, around 5 years ago, I got interested in web design and shortly after that I started doing it for a living. Over the course on the next few years I gradually transitioned into UI/UX.
